keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: Jacket potatoes cooked in their skins are very nutritious and full of fibre. Use Estima or Marfona potatoes.

method.text: Scrub and prick the potatoes all over. Place in the microwave for 10-15 min or until soft throughout.
Meanwhile, slice or grate the cheese.
Cut the cooked potatoes almost in half lengthways. Spoon in the salsa relish. Top with the cheese and season to taste. Serve.

title: Salsa jacket - microwave
